results.name: Number of 2n-bead balanced binary necklaces of fundamental period 2n which are equivalent to their reverse, complement and reversed complement.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for sequences related to Lyndon words
formula: Moebius transform of A045674. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 29 2017
a(n) = Sum_{d|n, d odd} mu(d) * 2^floor((n/d-1)/2) for n > 0.
mathematica: b[0] = 1; b[n_] := Module[{t = 0, r = n}, While[EvenQ[r], r = Quotient[r, 2]; t += 2^(r-1)]; t + 2^Quotient[r, 2]];
program: (PARI) a(n)={if(n<1, n==0, sumdiv(n, d, if(d%2, moebius(d)*2^((n/d-1)\2))))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Oct 01 2019
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
